SCNA 2015

Archive Snapshot

Learn.Collaborate.Build. Bringing Software Craftsmanship to Southern California November 6th,
2015Los Angeles, CA Schedule Venue Sponsors Media FAQ Register Registration will be closing on
Monday, November 2nd, so please register soon. There are only a few tickets left. Featuring Uncle
Bob@unclebobmartin Iris Classon@irisclasson Enrique Comba Riepenhausen@ecomba Sarah Mei@sarahmei
Justin Searls@searls Christin Gorman@christingorman Gary Bernhardt@garybernhardt Information Where
Radisson Los Angeles USC 3540 S Figueroa St Los Angeles, CA 90007 (323) 294-5200 When Friday,
November 6th, 2015 8:00AM - 6:00PM About SCNA is a conference for software professionals interested
in improving their craft, their community, and themselves. Learn Learning and teaching to improve
ourselves. Collaborate Providing an opportunity to connect and develop productive partnerships.
Build Building and celebrating a community of professionals while defining the industry. Code
Retreats Please join us for a full day of hands-on coding practice to improve your craft. Code
Retreat #1 will be at 8th Lights new office, and Code Retreat #2 will be located at Ticket Master.
Bring your computer and your brain—we've got the rest covered! Lunch will be provided. Code Retreat
#1 SOLD OUT 8th Light Los Angeles 315 W 9th St. Suite 901 Los Angeles, CA 90015 When Saturday
November 7th 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM Code Retreat #2 Tickets available Ticket Master 7060 Hollywood Blvd
Los Angeles, CA 90028 When Saturday November 7th 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM SCNA is hosted by USC The
University of Southern California is one of the world’s leading private research universities. An
anchor institution in Los Angeles, a global center for arts, technology and international business,
USC's diverse curricular offerings provide extensive opportunities for interdisciplinary study, and
collaboration with leading researchers in a highly advanced learning environment. With a strong
tradition of integrating liberal and professional education, USC fosters a vibrant culture of public
service and encourages students to cross academic as well as geographic boundaries in their pursuit
of knowledge. 8th Light 8th Light is a Chicago-based Agile software consultancy with expertise in a
variety of programming languages. We craft beautiful applications for your web, mobile, and embedded
projects. 8th Light also offers apprenticeships to push the limits of your knowledge in software
development. Many thanks to our sponsors Journeyman Sponsor Nordstromrack.com | HauteLook is the
largest e-commerce company in Los Angeles, located right in the heart of downtown. As part of the
Nordstrom family, we pride ourselves on delivering incredible customer service. We deliver great
products through creative and novel applications of open source technology. Media Sponsor Interested
in becoming a sponsor? View Prospectus ©2015 | Software Craftsmanship North America Contact Have
questions or comments? Send us an email. SCNA is produced by 8th Light, Inc. Code of Conduct Social
Follow @scna Mailing list Stay up-to-date with all conference news by joining our mailing list.
